pageContext.public_note: These Thanksgiving Break camps are 1 day classes. Students must sign up for each workshop individually. This Monday workshop will focus on building a LEGO Space Base!
pageContext.course_type_long_description: Blast off to space! Build a base on your favorite planet that is strong and has all the necessary resources to survive in such hard conditions. Then build a rover so you can go out and explore this strange environment.
pageContext.action_url_comment: These camps are 1 day classes. Students must sign up for each workshop individually. This Monday workshop will focus on building a LEGO Space Base!
